column1: #text=My friend and his wife have a dessert business and baking cakes is their specialty .
#text=Often , they 'll call me up to help them out in the shop for a few extra dollars if I have the time .
#text=I am always up to doing it !
#text=It is messy , but it is fun , and I can lick the spoon !
#text=Anyway , they were baking a few cakes the other day , and I came over just in time to help them with their last order .
#text=I put on my apron as we got out the flour , eggs , sugar , butter , and cake mix .
#text=We poured the cake mix , sugar , and flour in a bowl while we melted the butter and mixed it in with the eggs and some added water .
#text=Then , we mixed everything together with a beater .
#text=I swear , that is always the best part of baking a cake !
#text=I licked the little beater things clean while my friend 's wife greased the pans .
#text=We then pour the cake batter into the pans and put it into the oven which had already been preheated to 350 degrees .
#text=We left them in the oven for 25 minutes and once they were done , we got them out and put them on a window sill to cool .
